sentences.en: Republican leaders struggled to rule over increasingly restive populations.
sentences.cn: 人民不满情绪与日俱增，共和党领导人的统治举步维艰。

sentences.en: The cool, restive Halls of the Passed echo with his prophetic voice of eternal wisdom.
sentences.cn: 冰冷, 宁静的往者之亭回响着他充满智慧的预知之声.

sentences.en: The trouble, as you have found, is that the tier below will feel put - upon and restive.
sentences.cn: 麻烦在于 —— 正如你所发现的 —— 底下的人会感到成了牺牲品,而且心绪不宁.

sentences.en: When the singer was late, the audience grew restive.
sentences.cn: 歌手迟迟不出场, 听众变得不耐烦了.

sentences.en: Yet I am of opinion, this defect arises chiefly from a perverse, restive disposition.
sentences.cn: 但是我个人认为, 这个缺憾最主要是来自他们刚愎, 倔强的个性.
